column3: Thinking back to this vid got me out of bed and on the road this morning!
I am a cyclist, I am happy!https://youtu.be/tKkDfG67-qc
I have cycled through heat, rains and cold.... I cannot imagine a life without my bicycles. Truly!
Any chance of reviving the 'Rapha Rides' series, please?
Love the enthusiasm of the riders 😊
Sprayed with windscreen washer fluid and stung by a wasp yesterday... but still enjoyed being out. It’s part of cycling!
I’ve forgotten it’s not only about going fast or training, “it’s about the freedom”.
Nice video, inspires one to ride.👍

I have never once regretted riding where I didn't want to at the start. I've often been cold, wet and miserable - but then warming up with a coffee and a blanket back indoors is made all the more fulfilling.
Given advertising is about using real human sentiments and twisting them to sell product, a more appropriate name would be reasons to keep buying.
I've definitely had those rides when coming back home I've wished that I stayed in ^^ you know - bad blood circulation in hands, around zero degree temperatures, rain and snow and wind

no, i don't like this style of filming. i miss the old ones; without cheerful music, without full of funny and charmless interview speech "i like it because blah blah blah" which means "because i'm so f.cking worthy and the world revolves around me". sorry guys, your ads are not art anymore.
Nice film! Good choice of riders too! I only wish I had the time to go out for a ride myself. Life changes.
